snippet: Bishop Roman was the first Cuban to be appointed a bishop in the United States, and was a spiritual leader of Miami’s Cuban exile community.
abstract: Auxiliary Bishop Augustin A Roman, spiritual leader of Miami's Cuban exile community, dies at age 83.
lead_paragraph: Bishop Roman was the first Cuban to be appointed a bishop in the United States, and was a spiritual leader of Miami’s Cuban exile community.

headline.seo: Agustin Roman, Bishop Who Led Cuban Exiles, Is Dead at 83
headline.main: Agustin Roman, Bishop Who Led Cuban Exiles, Is Dead at 83
headline.print_headline: Agustin Roman, 83; Bishop Who Led Cuban Exiles
